name: ext_R2_CarePlan_ac_detail
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.CarePlan.activity.detail for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents CarePlan.activity.detail from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/CarePlan|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: A simple summary of a planned activity suitable for a general care plan system (e.g. form driven) that doesn't know about specific resources such as procedure etc.
element.comment: `CarePlan.activity.detail` has no related element in R5:CarePlan

element.short: Extra info describing activity to perform
element.definition: This provides a textual description of constraints on the intended activity occurrence, including relation to other activities. element.short: Extra info describing activity to perform
element.definition: This provides a textual description of constraints on the intended activity occurrence, including relation to other activities.  It may also include objectives, pre-conditions and end-conditions.  Finally, it may convey specifics about the activity such as body site, method, route, etc.
